title: MCP4H v0.1.1 — Additive update (envelope + profiles + examples + CI)
description:
MCP4H v0.1.1 is an additive update to the protocol specification and tooling.

Highlights:
- Envelope fields: profile, msg_type, seq, ts_monotonic_us, content_type
- Wire profiles: udp-realtime, mqtt-dist, ws-dashboard
- Content types: application/vnd.mcp4h.v0.1+json / +cbor
- Example: tyre-slip LED cues with UDP demo tools (examples_v0.1.1/tyre_slip/)
- Tests: JSON golden vectors, optional CBOR generator
- CI: merged workflow (schema checks, pytest, lint/type checks)

Versioning: emit version "0.1.1" (bare semver); accept legacy mcp4h/0.1 during v0.1.x.
